Class GITPublisherPlugin

java.lang.Object
org.tquadrat.foundation.gradle.gitpublisher.GITPublisherPlugin
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.gradle.api.Plugin<org.gradle.api.Project>
public final class GITPublisherPlugin extends Object implements org.gradle.api.Plugin<org.gradle.api.Project>
Publishes a project to GitHub.

  • Field Details

    • BASE_FOLDER_DEFAULT

      public static final String BASE_FOLDER_DEFAULT

      The name for the default base folder. It is relative to the project folder: "gitpublishwork".

      This folder will be created if it does not exist, but it will not be deleted on cleanup.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • GROUP

      public static final String GROUP
      The group for the tasks of this plugin.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • META_DIR_NAME

      public static final String META_DIR_NAME
      The default name for the folder mit the Git metadata files: "gitMeta". The folder is relative to the project folder.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • TARGET_NAME

      public static final String TARGET_NAME
      The prefix for the default name of the folder for the working copy of the Git repository.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • alwaysIgnored

      public static final Collection<PathMatcher> alwaysIgnored()

      Returns a list of name patterns for files and folders that are always excluded from being published.

      For the syntax of these patterns, refer to FileSystem.getPathMatcher(java.lang.String); if the syntax: prefix is missing, it will be set to "glob:".

      Returns:
      The patterns for the always excluded files and folders.

    • apply

      public final void apply(org.gradle.api.Project project)
      Specified by:
